ygData.subject: Re: Flight Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm, I m really not sure about these spells.  In the Doctrine of Wizardry, a receipe is given for the spell Flight .  And yet you can buy a spell called
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm, I'm really not sure about these spells. In the Doctrine of Wizardry,
a receipe is given for the spell "Flight". And yet you can buy a spell
called "Levitate". Are they both the same?? Did they just forget to rename
one of the spells?? Or, are the different??? Don't really know, maybe
someone who has successfully made the spell Flight can let us know ;)

Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard

----- Original Message -----
From: Valacian <abryson@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 3:33 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Flight Spell


> Actually, this spell does not need to be researched... I have it, I bought
it.... (The spell is called Levitate)
>
> Valacian - 24th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ken Lee [SMTP:kenlee@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 12:27 PM
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Flight Spell
>
> From: "Ken Lee" <kenlee@...>
>
> The Wizard Flight spell, is the same as the Shaman Levitate spell, and it
> needs to be researched. However, I've heard of people referring to the
> wizard spell as flight and also as levitate. I believe it's the same
thing.
>
> Zalbar
> 18th Wizard (sigh, died and lost a bub AGAIN last night)
> Solusek Ro
>
>
